meanings.definition: The quality or state of being generous or liberal in giving or spending
meanings.sent1: Her freehandednesses made her a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent2: His freehandednesses extended to helping those in need without hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The freehandednesses of the billionaire led to a town-wide celebration.
meanings.sent4: The freehandednesses of the teacher with praise boosted the students' confidence.
meanings.sent5: The freehandednesses of the chef in sharing recipes inspired many aspiring cooks.

meanings.definition: The act of giving or spending freely and generously
meanings.sent1: The freehandednesses of the charity organization helped countless families in need.
meanings.sent2: Their freehandednesses during the holiday season brought joy to many children.
meanings.sent3: The freehandednesses of the magician with tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The freehandednesses of the artist with paint created a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The freehandednesses of the gardener with seeds blossomed into a beautiful garden.
